頢字的基本解释

頢
kuò
脸型短。
头小的样子。

頢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuò］
［《廣韻》古活切，入未，見。］
(1)脸短窄。
(2)小头；小头貌。

頢字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頢； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1403第11
【廣韻】【集韻】?古活切，音括。【玉篇】短面貌。　又【廣韻】小頭貌。　又【玉篇】戸括切，音活。義同。

頢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
頢字的起名意思

暂无。

頢
Basic explanation of words
頢
kuò
The face is short.
The head is small.
頢
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuò]
["Guangyun" is ancient and lively, enters the past, see. ]
(1) The face is short and narrow.
(2) Small head; small head appearance.
頢
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　頢; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1403 No. 11
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ancient and lively, including sound. [Jade articles] Short face.　[Guang Yun] Small head appearance.　[Jade articles] including cut, sound and live. The same meaning.
